title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 181.4 - Enforcement and liability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 181.4 - Enforcement and liability

State Regulations

Any person possessing wildlife is liable for all reasonable
expenses incurred by the department as a result of its actions to quarantine or
euthanize said wildlife or for necessary measures taken to stop or mitigate the
spread of rabies caused by said wildlife. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
181.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
